articles.title: Canada’s Brooke Henderson secures 11th LPGA Tour win at ShopRite LPGA Classic - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The Smiths Falls, Ont., native eagled in a playoff against American Lindsay Weaver-Wright to secure the title.
articles.content:
Canada's Brooke Henderson has won the ShopRite LPGA Classic, securing her 11th LPGA Tour victory.
The 24-year-old entered the final round tied for ninth at 5-under, before hitting a 7-under 64 after… [+930 chars]

articles.title: McDonald’s restaurants in Russia reopen under new brand - The Guardian
articles.description: Named Vkusno & tochka (‘Tasty and that’s it’), the fast-food chain appears to be a copy of the American original
articles.content: Former McDonalds restaurants in the Russian capital have reopened under a new name, Vkusno & tochka (Tasty and thats it), in a rebranding intended to comfort Russians that they can continue to li… [+2714 chars]

articles.content:
